data.name: Domuns
data.detailed_description:
In this puzzle game, each character has unique but limited abilities.



Each part of Magnus can perform some actions, such as walking vertically, and pressing buttons, Sid and Liv also have unique abilities. By assembling them, it is possible to have access to the combination of their abilities!



Walk, join, push, disassemble, test different combinations to achieve new results. Together they are stronger, but apart they can be in more than one place at the same time. Use it in your favor.



While Magnus is part of a technological and lifeless planet, Sid and Liv come from a fantastic and colorful place. The contrast between worlds can be key to restoring order to the universe. For this, they will need to recover the fragments of the sacred crystal that contains the essence of life, which was broken after a war between nations.

Main Features


  • Challenging but satisfying puzzles
  • Unique character assembling mechanic
  • Help Sid, Liv and Magnus on a journey to save the universe
  • Contrast, cute and colorful visuals
  • Play alone or with a friend in co-op mode
  • Pixel art

data.short_description: In this puzzle game, each character has unique but limited abilities. Mix different characters together in smart ways to help Sid, Liv and Magnus restore order to this magical and technological universe!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
